N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 575.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of
the community support services program, is to provide comprehensive support
services within the community setting for those individuals who are seriously
and chronically mentally ill and living in the community. (b) The purpose of these regulations is to
establish the community support services program under the jurisdiction of the

Commissioner of Mental Health. (c) The purpose of these regulations is to establish standards and describe the
eligibility criteria for the community support services program by defining the
characteristics of seriously and chronically mentally ill
individuals. (d) These regulations
reinforce the State and local partnership in the provision of community support
services for seriously and chronically mentally ill individuals. (e) These regulations do not establish an
entitlement program. Notes
